Title: Relates to requiring gasoline stations to provide free air pumps and water for use in servicing motor vehicles
Summary: Relates to requiring gasoline stations to provide free air pumps and water for use in servicing motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd §396-x, Gen Bus L; amd §§16 & 192, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring gasoline stations to provide free air pumps and water for use in servicing motor vehicles
